title: avan mElenna
sahitya:
avan mEl enna pizhaiyE ashaTTu manamE aDangAp-piDAri nIyE dayAparan


anupallavi

  kaviyOgi vaNangiDum kAdalanE unadu kaNavanAgiyum summA piNangi alaiginrAi


caraNam    uDal koDuttAn adil uyirAgat-tuDittAn uLam koDuttAn inda ulagaiyum koDuttAn
dhiDam koDuttAn aruL iDam koDuttAn emmAn dinamaNI sukhamaNI divyamaNi suguNi
